articles.title: Filipino American lawmaker named California attorney general - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Rob Bonta makes history as California's first Filipino American attorney general. In his confirmation hearing, Bonta vowed to push for significant changes in the criminal justice system.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, April 24) Lawmaker Rob Bonta has been appointed as California's new attorney general, becoming the first Filipino American to hold such position.
The California legisl… [+1402 chars]

articles.title: US Ex-Cop Chauvin To Be Sentenced June 16 For George Floyd Murder - Channels Television
articles.description: Sacked US police officer Derek Chauvin will be sentenced on June 16 for the murder of African American George Floyd in a case that sparked nationwide anti-racism protests. The Hennepin County District Court in the Midwestern city of Minneapolis, where handcuf…

articles.title: Iconic McDonald's outlet in Ridout Tea Garden to shut in December after 32 years in operation - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A 32-year-old McDonald's outlet in Ridout Tea Garden will be closing its doors in December. A spokesman for the American fast food chain told The Straits Times on Friday (April 23) that the outlet will cease operations upon the expiry of its lease…

articles.title: BSP coordinating with Citi Philippines on planned consumer banking exit - GMA News Online
articles.description: The Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) said Friday it is coordinating with Citi Philippines after its parent Citigroup, an American banking giant, announced it will be closing its consumer banking business in 13 countries, including the Philippines.
